deploy.startCommand: cd packages/server && echo '=== Checking public directory ===' && ls -la public/ && echo '=== Checking assets ===' && ls -la public/assets/ | head -20 && find public/assets -name 'index-*.js' | head -1 && find public/assets -name 'index-*.css' | head -1 && echo "Total files: $(find public -type f | wc -l)" && echo '=== Starting server ===' && bun dist/index.js
